title: Add provider utility tests
description:
{
  "priority": 4,
  "type": "test",
  "context": "src/providers/deepgram_utils.py and provider_utils.py have ZERO tests. Shared logic across all providers for response parsing, error handling, validation.",
  "business_context": "Prevents API response parsing failures, incorrect error translation, file validation bugs.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "Create tests/unit/test_deepgram_utils.py",
    "Create tests/unit/test_provider_utils.py",
    "Test response parsing edge cases",
    "Test error code translation",
    "Test file size limit enforcement",
    "Test format validation"
  ],
  "success_criteria": [
    "Both utility files tested",
    "Edge cases covered (missing fields, invalid formats)",
    "Error handling verified",
    "100% coverage of utility functions"
  ]
}
